org.apache.tomcat.util.codec

接口 BinaryEncoder

  • 所有超级接口:
    Encoder
    所有已知实现类:
    Base64, BaseNCodec
    已过时。 
    This interface is unused and will be removed in Tomcat 9

    @Deprecated
public interface BinaryEncoder
extends Encoder
    Defines common encoding methods for byte array encoders.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 已过时的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      byte[] encode(byte[] source)
      已过时。 
      Encodes a byte array and return the encoded data as a byte array.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.tomcat.util.codec.Encoder

        encode

    • 方法详细资料

      • encode

        byte[] encode(byte[] source)
       throws EncoderException
        已过时。 
        Encodes a byte array and return the encoded data as a byte array.
        参数:
        source - Data to be encoded
        返回:
        A byte array containing the encoded data
        抛出:
        EncoderException - thrown if the Encoder encounters a failure condition during the encoding process.
